extendedInfo.description: Whether you spend your days exploring the culinary arts or spend as little time in the kitchen as possible, thereâs something for everyone with German and Austrian Recipes. Never before has such an extensive, easy to use database been compiled for use right at your fingertips!

reviews.title: This is a great app!
reviews.comment: I am of German decent and was brought up on german food. These recipes are very close to my Grandmothers!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Looks absolutely authentic. Can\'t wait. Works like a dream on my mono Droid 2 global ~phantel
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Finally what a Bavarian / Austrian was looking for!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Yum  Yum  Yum
reviews.comment: Yum the old recipes I remember when I was young. Thank You.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Can\'t get to work
reviews.comment: I have tried installing it twice now and app will not open past the main screen very unhappy
reviews.author: A Google User
